MathNet.Numerics.Distributions.ChiSquareDistribution Class Reference

Provides generation of chi-square distributed random numbers. More...

Detailed Description

Provides generation of chi-square distributed random numbers.

The implementation of the ChiSquareDistribution type bases upon information presented on Wikipedia - Chi-square distribution.
